metadata.title: CVE-2023-52631 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Fix an NULL dereference bug The issue here is when this is calledfrom ntfs_load_attr_list(). The "size" comes fromle32_to_cpu(attr->res.data_size) so it can't overflow on a 64bit systemsbut on 32bit systems the "+ 1023" can overflow and the result is zero. Thismeans that the kmalloc will succeed by returning the ZERO_SIZE_PTR and thenthe memcpy() will crash with an Oops on the next line.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
